io.github.jeremysher.vector

Class VectorField

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jeremysher.vector.VectorField

  • public abstract class VectorField
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for vector field operations, such as partial derivatives, divergence, and curl.
    Author:
    Jeremy Sher

      The vector field.

    • Method Detail

      • function

        public abstract Vector function(Vector p)
        The vector field. Returns a vector for any point in a space.
        Parameters:
        p - A position vector that represents a point in space.
        Returns:
        The resulting vector.

      • div

        public double div(Vector p)
        Computes the divergence of the vector field at any point.
        Parameters:
        p - A position vector that represents a point in space.
        Returns:
        The divergence of the vector field at the specified point.

      • curl

        public Vector curl(Vector p)
        Computes the curl of the vector field at any point.
        Parameters:
        p - A position vector that represents a point in space.
        Returns:
        The curl of the vector field at the specified point.

      • part

        public double part(Vector p,
                   int topComp,
                   int bottomComp)
        Computes the partial derivative of a specified component of the vector field with respect to a specified spacial dimension.
        Parameters:
        p - A position vector that represents a point in space.
        topComp - A component of the vector field.
        bottomComp - A spacial dimension.
        Returns:
        The partial derivative.
